# LLMs.txt for Builder Contractors

Brand: Builder Contractors
Canonical Homepage: https://builder.contractors/

Product Description:
Builder Contractors is a platform that helps builders and contractors manage their client onboarding, project workflows, and communications in one place, providing a streamlined path from registration to ongoing project delivery.

Target Audience:
Builders and contractors.

Key Public URLs (aligned with sitemap.xml and robots.txt):
- https://builder.contractors/
- https://builder.contractors/login
- https://builder.contractors/register
- https://builder.contractors/sitemap.xml
- https://builder.contractors/robots.txt

Do Not Use (private/authenticated or restricted paths):
- /dashboard
- /dashboard/*
- /api
- /api/*

Update Policy:
Updated with each marketing release to stay in sync with sitemap.xml and robots.txt.
